about_the_game:
Tour around the world and become a rap star in this fun 2D pixel-art platformer!

Travel around the world and become a rap star! Choose your favorite rapper, grab the microphone and beat your enemies in this fun 2D pixel-art adventure / action / platformer.

LET'S RAP!

➜ Tour around 7 real world countries and 60 playable levels
➜ Get on stage and fight against 7 different final bosses
➜ Choose and unlock 15 unique playable characters
➜ Unlock new rappers, skills, outfits and songs
➜ Collect hidden collectibles and sign autographs to your fans in every city
➜ Enjoy beautiful hand-drawn pixel art that will delight the most nostalgic people
➜ Rap music and chiptune music come together in a soundtrack with +20 original songs

STORY

You are an underground rapper and one day the opportunity to go on a world tour arises. But, surprise! The Cancel-Team wants to censor your lyrics and prevent you from performing your concerts. They are going to chase you through every city, so fight them, get gold records, sign autographs for your fans and recruit new rappers for your team (like Snoop Frog, Sliminem, Notorious P.I.G, 25 Cent, Lil Pain... and many more).

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

Enjoy original songs performed by the game's protagonist, Don Aitor, narrating the events of the video game. His friends have fire tracks too! You can find the main song (and its official music video) in the second video on the Steam store page. You can also find it on YouTube, titled "Don Aitor - Rap Attack!"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

name: Rap Attack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
